title: (x) F.U.N.4 Dogs website navigation - Ondine {Lex}
content:
Somebody know what font is used for the buttons on the left site on this website:  
 [http://www.fun4dogs.nl](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020021740/http:/www.fun4dogs.nl/ "http://www.fun4dogs.nl")

thanks!
author: erwinb

comments.content:
It looks like Ondine to me (and probably the Linotype cut, due to the small numeral '4').

In the future, you'll get better and faster (well, maybe just faster) results if you:

1. Post to the Type ID Board instead of the Design board.  
2. Come up with a thread title that is meaningful.  
3. Read the FAQ fully before posting.

- Lex
